overview: J.D. Kollin and Brandon Irons are two studs enjoying some private time together, hanging out one night at an outdoor cabana, complete with a roaring fire. The mood is right, and after a few beers, these guys are really into each other. The sound of a motorcycle breaks the evening silence as Tony Bishop drives up on his bike. Even before the tailpipe has had a chance to cool down, all three guys are going at it.
title: Escape From San Francisco
